title: Eggless Cake
instructions: 1. In a bowl, combine 2 cups of all-purpose flour, 1 cup of sugar, and 1 teaspoon of baking soda. 2. Add 1 cup of milk, 1/2 cup of vegetable oil, and 1 tablespoon of vinegar to the dry ingredients. 3. Mix until smooth, pour into a greased cake pan, and bake at 350°F (180°C) for 25-30 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean.
ingredients: 1. All purpose Flour. 2. Vegetable oil 3. Yogurt. 4. Baking Soda 5. Sugar.

title: Vanilla velvet cake Eggless
instructions: 1. In a bowl, combine 2 cups of all-purpose flour, 1 cup of sugar, and 1 teaspoon of baking soda. 2. Add 1 cup of milk, 1/2 cup of vegetable oil, red food colouring and 1 tablespoon of vinegar to the dry ingredients. 3. Mix until smooth, pour into a greased cake pan, and bake at 350°F (180°C) for 25-30 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean.
ingredients: 1. Vegetable oil, 2. red food colouring 3. sugar 4. butter 5. all purpose flour

title: chocolate cake
instructions: In a bowl, combine 2 cups of all-purpose flour, 1 cup of sugar, and 1 teaspoon of baking soda. 2. Add 1 cup of milk, 1/2 cup of vegetable oil, 2 spoons of cocoa powder and 1 tablespoon of vinegar to the dry ingredients. 3. Mix until smooth, pour into a greased cake pan, and bake at 350°F (180°C) for 25-30 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean.
ingredients: 1. Vegetable oil, 2. cocoa powder 3. sugar 4. butter 5. all purpose flour

title: Classic Red Velvet Cake
instructions: 1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). 2. In a mixing bowl, cream together butter and sugar until light and fluffy. 3. Beat in eggs one at a time, then stir in vanilla. 4. In a separate bowl, whisk together flour, cocoa powder, baking soda, and salt. 5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients, alternating with buttermilk. 6. Pour the batter into greased cake pans and bake for 25-30 minutes.
ingredients: 1. Butter, 2. Sugar, 3. Eggs, 4. Vanilla extract, 5. All-purpose flour, 6. Cocoa powder, 7. Baking soda, 8. Salt, 9. Buttermilk

title: Lemon Blueberry Bundt Cake
instructions: 1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). 2. In a bowl, mix flour, baking powder, and salt. 3. In another bowl, beat together butter, sugar, and eggs. 4. Add lemon zest and juice, then gradually mix in the dry ingredients. 5. Fold in fresh blueberries. 6. Pour the batter into a greased bundt pan and bake for 40-45 minutes.
ingredients: 1. Butter, 2. Sugar, 3. Eggs, 4. All-purpose flour, 5. Baking powder, 6. Salt, 7. Lemon zest, 8. Lemon juice, 9. Blueberries
